resources.string: RecordIPIN records back-facing cameras, IMU, and GNSS data on an Android smartphone, which is developed by
RecordIPIN is developed by SHULI ZHU for efficiently recording back-facing camera, IMU, and GNSS data on an Android smartphone.
The source code for this app is available at

All data sessions are saved in '/Android/data/com.zhushuli.recordipin/files/data' on the SD card. Each data session in a folder named local time (YYYY_MM_DD_hh_mm_ss) at the start of recording has three parts:

 IMU
 1. ACCEL.csv: Accelerometer data.
 2. GYRO.csv: Gyroscope data.
 
 GNSS
 3. GNSS.csv: GNSS data.
 4. GnssClock.csv: GNSS clock data.
 
 Camera
 5. Movie.mp4: Back-facing camera frames.
 6. FrameTimestamp.csv: Camera frame timestamp.
 7. FrameMetadata.csv: Camera frame metadata.
